title: Table of Offerings
description: Limestone offering table, the surface rather blistered, inscribed for Senbet, Sobekennakht’s daughter. The table has 4 inter-linked troughs leading to a spout at the front. At the rear is a raised-relief image of the Htp sign, the loaf of bread itself carved in relief with images of other offerings; vegetables, bread, cuts of meat etc.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
